AttributeList.Text: Meltrate correction for the every phase

TODO: link a variable {#_t_mr_time}
The SW-controller can work with shorter cycle time than MR-controller. And the process parameters P and R depend from each other. To avoid a disturbance from a transfer procees we will use next method: * MR cycle time = SW cycle time * Factor[Int >= 1] * MR clock pulses has a phase (shift) relative to the SW clock pulses
